topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b585696368722f3efc0800#post_54b585696368722f3efc0800
So when is Dio gonna fined out he can use the force?
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b5859463687205f5800900#post_54b5859463687205f5800900
Never.
I'm trying to keep as balanced as possible. Dio using his Stand and vampire powers and Vader using his Saber and the Force. The problem with any kind of crossover fight fic is that the creator will inevitably feel some kind of favoritism to one of the characters and I'm trying to limit that as much as possible.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
